price: 2 l’avènement d’un Messager envoyé par Allah leur récitant des feuillets d’une grande pureté,
arabic: رَسُولٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتۡلُواْ صُحُفٗا مُّطَهَّرَةٗ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: rasūlun mina al-lahi yatlū ṣuḥufan muṭahharatan
